timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs Chivas USA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Patrick MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Luyindula with the right offensive minded passes, he'll find Cahill or Henry soon enough #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Eriq Zavaleta (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Chris Ravita
timelineItems.text: Henry/Cahill/Luyindula constantly looking for the ball over the top. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA & #NYRB wearing black armband in honor of former #MLS player Shawn Kuykendall who passed away from Thymic Carcinoma #Kuykenstrong

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA y #NYRB con bandas negras en honor al ex jugador de la #MLS Shawn Kuykendall, quien falleció de Thymic Carcinoma #Kuykenstrong

timelineItems.name: JP
timelineItems.text: Solid XI selected by Petke #rbny

timelineItems.name: cdmccurdy
timelineItems.text: #rbny vs. Chivas. Let's get a win. #runwithus

timelineItems.name: MLS Fantasy Insider
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA have conceded at least 2 goals in 8 of their last 9 away matches in Major League Soccer. #NYvCHV #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Sal Liguori
timelineItems.text: @Tim_Cahill at striker thank god ��� #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Tom LoFaso
timelineItems.text: Come on you @newyorkredbulls #rbny

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're off at Red Bull Arena between @NewYorkRedBulls + @CDChivasUSA. Follow here: http://t.co/XSO2fCWTIq #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Samantha M.
timelineItems.text: I wish we would stop playing Cahill as a striker. #rbny

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Great set piece delivery by Henry, finds the lane for Cahill who heads it on net, but Kennedy does well to cover #NYvCHV #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #Chivas kept that line much further back than last week against FCD. #lessonlearned #NYvCHV, #ChivasUSA, #nyrb

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Credit Miller on that near break-out sequence: stepped up to challenge ball, disrupted, gathered and found outlet off-balance #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bobby Convey (New York Red Bulls).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: K+S Soccer Film Fest
timelineItems.text: Just an afternoon at the park w one Thierry Henry & the @NewYorkRedBulls. #RBNY #SoccerInNYC http://t.co/Ga9TQnWeha

timelineItems.name: K+S Soccer Film Fest
timelineItems.text: Just an afternoon at the park w one Thierry Henry & the @NewYorkRedBulls. #RBNY #SoccerInNYC http://t.co/Ga9TQnWeha

timelineItems.name: Capt'n Morgan
timelineItems.text: Armando was a mistake. Should not have got him. He'll spend more time explaining himself on disciplinary actions than playing #NYvCHV #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Pro Soccer News
timelineItems.text: #MauroRosales trying to help engineer a comeback by #ChivasUSA after leaving the #Sounders this year

timelineItems.comment: Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA).
Delay in match Erick Torres (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: the J the I the M..
timelineItems.text: Stretch BEFORE the game #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Mike Kane
timelineItems.text: Erick Torres isn't even trying now. Chivas lose possession and he lays down. #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls).
Foul by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).
Armando (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, New York Red Bulls. Jamison Olave tries a through ball, but Thierry Henry is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Armando (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Armando commits one too many fouls

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Cubo was down moments earlier, now Rosales. Chivas attack taking a beating so far. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: TheFaust
timelineItems.text: #RBNY dominating possession in the top third of their own half!

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New York Red Bulls 1, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.name: Jessica Iannetta
timelineItems.text: Well, they didn't make it easy but they fought to the end. A tie never felt more like a win. What a finish. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Péguy Luyindula! Relief for @NewYorkRedBulls as they find the equalizer in the 95th minute. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Persistence pays off for @NewYorkRedBulls with this equalizer from Peguy Luyindula. 90+5: http://t.co/rqGDIz6UR5 #NYvCHV

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls look for their first win of the season as they host Chivas USA at Red Bull Arena.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York Red Bulls vs. Chivas USA | March 30, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@NewYorkRedBulls leave it late, very late to draw 1-1 with @CDChivasUSA. #NYvCHV Recap: http://t.co/MwuyZIXUQT

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: The only thing stopping McCarty's #GOTW strike was this #SOTW material from @1DanKennedy. Clutch: http://t.co/TIi5hgIjMR #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Armando gets a yellow for killing Rosales. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Armando yellow card... drink #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Armando (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Adam Herman
timelineItems.text: .@MSGNetworks is currently broadcasting the #RBNY game like a visual representation of dubstep. Keeps skipping and freezing.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Lloyd Sam tries a through ball, but Tim Cahill is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Armando has been very vocal in this game. Keeps having words with Miller, whose movement has been suspect. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Eckersley pulls down McNamara

timelineItems.name: Anthony Spatola
timelineItems.text: Armando has officially become the Phillipe Mexes of #MLS three games into his career #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Kevin's Myth
timelineItems.text: Currently watching Spanish broadcast of Red Bulls since MSG downgraded their broadcast to dial-up. #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Chivas USA. Thomas McNamara draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 0, Chivas USA 1. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Cubo Torres goes down the middle

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: We don’t have TVs in the box, but it looks like the right call. Someone plowed over Torres in the box. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Shane
timelineItems.text: Wait, why did we get rid of Barks again? #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Hiba
timelineItems.text: Pretty sure that was not PK worthy. Maybe I need to watch it again. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Cubo shoots straight down the middle as Robles dives to his left. 1-0 to Chivas. Against the run of play as well. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Armando.

timelineItems.name: Pardeep Cattry
timelineItems.text: Richard Eckersley: 4 games in, conceded 2 penalties. #OhBoy #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Mendez
timelineItems.text: I'm not even going to hate on you, Cubo. Get yours. Rub it in. I respect your grind. #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! "Cubo" Torres hauled down in the box. He converts the PK to give @CDChivasUSA the 1-0 lead. http://t.co/RLqMiRCa2d #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: James J Pepe
timelineItems.text: Eckersely and Convey starting for NY... Guess Petke still hasn't "found" his best 11. Those 2 are downgrades from 2013. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Grant McCool
timelineItems.text: Our aggressive defense increasingly looks like a liability #RBNY get a grip

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Pecoraro
timelineItems.text: Oh god Tim Cahill's down and BWP's warming up. This game is turning awful #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Brian Witthuhn
timelineItems.text: #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Armando (New York Red Bulls).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: John E. Rojas
timelineItems.text: Hablando de lesiones previas a #Brasil2014 Tim Cahil #Australia deja partido d su equipo #NYRB #MLS con lo q parece ser tirón @titopuccettic

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! McNamara hauled down in the box. "Cubo" Torres converts the PK to give @cdchivasusa the 1-0 lead. http://t.co/RLqMiRCa2d #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Bobby Convey is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Frankie
timelineItems.text: We may have lost Tim, but BWP has got the right stuff! #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Thomas McNamara (Chivas USA).

Offside, New York Red Bulls. Armando tries a through ball, but Bobby Convey is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: Gotta wonder if Petke is urging his backline to play rough, or we signed some bad apples? #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill subs off with a right hamstring injury. Bradley Wright-Phillips comes on for @NewYorkRedBulls. http://t.co/SrzvFa9J8D #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: amadi tidiane
timelineItems.text: what a clearance by Olave. hasn't been getting the praise he deserves, especially early this season. still 1-0 Chivas, 32'. #NYRB

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Eriq Zavaleta tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: SoccerLIMagazine
timelineItems.text: #RBNY Shep Messing with a significant criticism of Red Bulls' lack of focus and intensity.

timelineItems.name: Chris Ravita
timelineItems.text: #Chivas are well organized in midfield. Tough for #RBNY to get going. There is space over the top, though.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Pecoraro
timelineItems.text: By the way, IIRC #RBNY led the league in penalties allowed last year and they're on the fast track to repeat that title. 3 in 4 games

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Roy Miller tries a through ball, but Thierry Henry is caught offside.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Richard Eckersley.

timelineItems.name: Frank J. Maduri
timelineItems.text: Convey has to do something in this game #rbny

timelineItems.name: Orri Ýrar Smárason
timelineItems.text: What did Conor Lade do wrong? Miles better than this Eckersley chap but dosent get a look in! #RBNY #MetroStars

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Carlos Bocanegra tries a through ball, but Leandro Barrera is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: "Cubo" Torres picks Main Street to convert his PK and give @CDChivasUSA the 1-0 lead. Watch: http://t.co/LD8ZUxaVB1 #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Steve Ferrigan
timelineItems.text: That was a pretty great shot of the red bulls back line raging at each other. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: Armando is going to be red card bait this season #RBNY

timelineItems.name: El Niño Salvaje
timelineItems.text: The great Hristo Stoichkov is doing color commentary on Unimas #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Armando is the most brainless centre back I've ever seen when it comes to tackling. #RBNY #NYvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Grant McCool
timelineItems.text: Literally falling over each other in the box #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Daniel Pecoraro
timelineItems.text: I'm a fan of a hard man, but Armando's just reckless #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: If Chivas wasn't diving so much they'd have a couple more goals right now. #RBNY is playing terribly.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: "Cubo" Torres down again. Someone get him an ice bath at halftime. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Agustin Pelletieri (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Pelletieri hacks at Wright-Phillips

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Continuity? Doesn't look like it out there. Armando frustrated after misunderstanding w Convey. Then McCarty plays pass to no one. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Michael Milberger
timelineItems.text: Would love to see a bench press contest between Olave & Armando or one of those cross-fit things #NYvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sam with great individual dribble to start a dangerous counter that ends with him fouled. And his left cleat coming off. FK coming up. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) header from the center of the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Jamison Olave’s header goes wide

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam one of the few players busting ass out there today. Wish his energy was more contagious. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Totally Red Bull
timelineItems.text: King Luis the Great. Its a pleasure watching him play keeper. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Frank Giase
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls passing out of the back has been dreadful. Chivas pressing the ball and cutting off passing lanes. #RBNY looks disjointed.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Kimura enters the match. A vital opportunity to prove his worth -- esp. after the performance Ecks put in. #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Franco Stewart
timelineItems.text: @newyorkredbulls @MLS can we get a dive count on #chivasusa players in the first half? I'm almost double digits

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Mendez
timelineItems.text: We are dead last in chances created (23). I'm allowed to at least start being a bit concerned. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: supporter
timelineItems.text: Apparently Greg Louganis is the new Chivas coach. #Rbny

timelineItems.name: TheFaust
timelineItems.text: Fun Fact: Cubo Torres is first MLS player made entirely of paper mâché. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
First Half ends, New York Red Bulls 0, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.name: Pro Soccer News
timelineItems.text: HT: #NYRB 0-1 #ChivasUSA (Torres PK) New York in foul trouble and a lot of finger pointing going on

timelineItems.name: Upper 90 Soccer
timelineItems.text: HT: Frustrating half for #RBNY as Chivas lead 1-0 through Torres' spot kick. Not many chances for Henry and company.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Truth be told, #RBNY lucky they're playing #ChivasUSA. If Goats had little more quality, game could easily be 3-0. Red Bulls far from good.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Two UConn kids making #ChviasUSA debuts today: Brooklyn native @ajeanbaptiste92 and Carlos Alvarez. #MarchMadness #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: #RBNY definitely having defensive issues, but as long as they can't connect a pass in the attacking third defense doesn't even matter

timelineItems.name: ChivaUSA Fighter
timelineItems.text: 45 more minutes to get another goal and get a win!!! The boys are playing with passion!! ARRIBA LAS CHIVAS!! #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Michael Ferrell
timelineItems.text: @aewsome Chivas started, not sure when #RBNY plan to.

timelineItems.name: Peter Hirdt
timelineItems.text: In 4 games this season, @cdchivasusa has allowed only 3 shots on goal in 1st half (10 after halftime, heading into today's 2d half). #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: 0-1 at HT and #RBNY need to improve drastically if they're to get anything from this. #Chivas looking comfortable. #FRLive #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: K.O. Wrzeszczynski
timelineItems.text: Ugly game are the refs still on strike? And Chivas No.9 Torres can be a drama opera star. @NewYorkRedBulls #NYRB hoping for better 2nd :45

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New York Red Bulls 0, Chivas USA 1.
Offside, Chivas USA. Thomas McNamara tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: TyZo "El Chapo" Mino
timelineItems.text: Game on c'mon red bulls #redbulls #soccer #nyrb

timelineItems.name: amadinho gaucho
timelineItems.text: 25 seconds into the 2nd half, Henry already exasperated with teammates' misplaced pass. could be a long rest of the game. #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Tonino
timelineItems.text: @empireofsoccer As usual, Luis Robles keeping #rbny in the game.

timelineItems.name: Gabriel Ribeiro
timelineItems.text: 2nd half kicks off and #RBNY are done 0-1 from conceding a penalty in the 21st

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Eckersley injury is a right ankle sprain. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Frank J. Maduri
timelineItems.text: I think Komura is better suited in this game than Eckersley anyway...#RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Péguy Luyindula is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jamie
timelineItems.text: It's too cold for this! ❄️☔️ #rbny #redbulls #soccer #supporters #newyorkredbulls ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Katie Cortina
timelineItems.text: Chivas defense is intense. Lots of pressure. C'mon #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Michael Ferrell
timelineItems.text: @aewsome The #RBNY are playing so bad against Chivas USA they look like Chivas USA.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Péguy Luyindula is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jamie Donnelly
timelineItems.text: #RBNY are sticking to the same tactics from the first half, knocking the ball aimlessly forward and half-hoping Henry will find it. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Lloyd Sam.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Best attacking moments from #RBNY. Sam wriggles free on the right and picks out BWP in the box. Shot flashed high and wide.

timelineItems.name: Brian E. Long⭐
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam is just brilliant on the ball. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dax McCarty.

timelineItems.desc: Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle and Dan Haiek preview the Sunday afternoon match between the New York Red Bulls and Chivas USA. Will it be a battle of 4-4-2's? Can Chivas keep the Red Bulls wings quiet? Find out Sunday at 3pm ET on UniMas.
timelineItems.title: New York Red Bulls vs. Chivas USA March 30, 2014 Preview | The Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Chris Ravita
timelineItems.text: There are a lot of things to like about Erick Torres. The amount of embellishment is not one of them. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: amadinho gaucho
timelineItems.text: Torres once again doing his best "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" impression with a fantastic dive and series of rolls. #NYRB #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Andrew Winner
timelineItems.text: RBNY are trying to maim the Cubo. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: #RBNY pressing higher and creating more opportunities.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: SAM, WIDE! Much better build-up play from #RBNY leads to a Sam shot/cross that goes agonizingly wide of far post. Red Bulls knocking on door

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Tonino
timelineItems.text: @empireofsoccer dax need glasses? He's making alot of passes to NO ONE. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Carlos Bocanegra.

timelineItems.name: Angelo Cacao
timelineItems.text:
The man, the myth, the legend!! Thierry Henry!!
#rbny

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Did #RBNY get the hair dryer treatment from Petke at half? Much more intensity and attacking impetus from New York this half.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Roy Miller tries a through ball, but Thierry Henry is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris Ravita
timelineItems.text: There is space to be had in behind the #Chivas defense. Can #RBNY exploit it?

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Much brighter start from #RBNY this half. BWP and Lloyd Sam causing all kinds of problems on the flanks, still 0-1 though. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Rob FTR
timelineItems.text: Bradley Wright Phillips needs to be in the lineup on a consistent basis. His speed is a weapon. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Grant McCool
timelineItems.text: First promising sequence #RBNY ends with Titi not quite getting enough of ball

timelineItems.name: Samantha M.
timelineItems.text: No one is ever on the end of these crosses. Ever. #changethat #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Tim Coyne
timelineItems.text: #RBNY continues to look threatening on the flanks but not so much in the box #NYvCHIV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Pres.Clint Dempsey
timelineItems.text: #RBNY needs a center forward dead in the middle whenever there's crosses and airballs.

timelineItems.comment: Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).
Kosuke Kimura (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chalk itup to scouting? Good defense? The #ChivasUSA game plan? Leandro Barrera =shackled. Only 1 pass forward. Tiny influence #nyvchv #mls

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: Trying to figure out who the Men of the Match might be in this one, but most players are spending most of their time on the ground. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: I won't go as far as saying that these Chivas USA players like to dive, but they do enjoy embellishing things a bit much. #PlayOn #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.comment: Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Upper 90 Soccer
timelineItems.text: Red Bull Arena erupts, but it's not a goal. Luyindula's tap-in waved off for a foul on Kennedy #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kosuke Kimura (New York Red Bulls).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Brian E. Long⭐
timelineItems.text: Roy Miller, pay attention to your buddy Armando. That's how you back heel. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Sam really has his tail up. Everything that's working is finding its genesis at his feet. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Greg Lalas
timelineItems.text: Is Bofo about to pick up the Stanley Cup? #whitegloves #NYvCHV

timelineItems.text: Good pressure from Peguy on Kennedy there. Neither team looking really into this yet. #RBNY

timelineItems.text: .@NewYorkRedBulls equalizer waved off as Kosuke Kimura interferes with @CDChivasUSA's GK Dan Kennedy (67'). http://t.co/MHDMMf2E1h #NYvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Wright-Phillips slides it wide

timelineItems.name: Brian E. Long⭐
timelineItems.text: Convey off Steele on please. #RBNY

timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy sticks out a foot to deny Wright-Phillips

timelineItems.name: Pardeep Cattry
timelineItems.text: Does Bofo have the worst hair in the league? The world? #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Thierry Henry.
Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Armando.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Henry with a glorious dummy, but Kennedy comes up HUGE to stop BWP. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 72' Henry springs Wright-Phillips, who makes a diagonal run with the ball before pulling a shot past the left post. #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Tenacious work by Wright-Phillips. #RBNY. Where has this work rate been all season?

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: DAN. KENNEDY. Take nothing away from #ChivasUSA -- they are earning this result. Point blank stop on BWP one on one #RBNY #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: You reap what you sow. #RBNY time and time again wasteful in front of goal. 1-0 down in the 75th.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: supporter
timelineItems.text: My little Bofo #RBNY http://t.co/iXzClYeqtP

timelineItems.name: supporter
timelineItems.text: My little Bofo #RBNY http://t.co/iXzClYeqtP

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@1DanKennedy does his best 'Smokey The Bear' impression smothering that Wright-Phillips breakaway like a light-night campfire. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ken Shadford
timelineItems.text: All #ChivasUSA players are required to pass an acting audition before joining the squad. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@1DanKennedy does his best 'Smokey The Bear' impression smothering that Wright-Phillips breakaway like a late-night campfire. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the left side of the six yard box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Lloyd Sam with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Kirsten Heimlich
timelineItems.text: Kennedy is the only thing keeping Chivas USA in this game #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Armando (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adolfo Bautista (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Sam with excellent work again. Henry heads it slightly over. Best game I've seen Sam play. And that's considering a poor first half. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Bobby Convey.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sam is completely dominating #ChivasUSA left back Lochhead. Turning him every which way and inside out. Still no goal to show for it. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls really knocking on the door. We SHOULD see a #RBNY equalizer if this pressure carries on. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Nice buildup play by Cubo and Rosales but ball just out of reach of NJ-native Thomas McNamara #NYvCHV, #ChivasUSA, #nyrb

timelineItems.name: ChivaUSA Fighter
timelineItems.text: Game plan for NYRB. FOUL everyone at all times. #NYvCHV Let's go boys!!! ARRIBA LAS CHIVAS!!! #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Convey's move to the middle has made a big difference. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).
Carlos Alvarez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @NewYorkRedBulls have conceded a penalty goal in 4 of their last 7 regular season games in @MLS. Trend. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.text: This 2nd half is crazy #NYRB is desperate to score all @NewYorkRedBulls now but no goal yet. http://t.co/h6EtQbNjmK

timelineItems.text: Just heard thunder at Red Bull Arena. It just knocked over Chivas' Torres. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.
Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kosuke Kimura with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: BIG STOP AGAIN FROM KENNEDY on a nice volley from Dax. Crowd is screaming for a goal. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Thomas McNamara (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Kosuke Kimura.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy has to be man of the match. HAS TO. McCarty with an unreal shot, denied, Luyindula follows, stopped! #NYvCHV #RBNY #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy, amazing punch over the bar followed up with another great save. There's your #nyvchv man of the match right there.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Adolfo Bautista (Chivas USA).
Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Chivas USA. Thomas McNamara tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy. Wowzas! #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Jason A
timelineItems.text: Eric Alexander is who will put us over the top...? Sigh. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Kevin Bruns
timelineItems.text: Has Dan Kennedy gotten looks from the #USMNT? If not let's get on that, @J_Klinsmann. Guy's putting on a show. #RBNY #ChivasUSA #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: McNamara coming off for #ChivasUSA. Looks absolutely knackered coming off the pitch, put in a strong shift on the left side.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #chivasusa has six shots--five of which were blocked. The other one--Cubo's penalty. #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ravi Cattry
timelineItems.text: Kimura/Sam partnership is million times better than Eckersley/Sam. Eckersley slows things down way too much. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Bobby Convey with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: A kick-save worthy of the @NHL. @1DanKennedy stuffs Wright-Phllips. Watch: http://t.co/Z8wQTH0bov #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Roy Miller.

timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Bofo kicks the ball away

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: So if you figure 30 seconds for each Chivas dive, we're talking 3.5 hours of stoppage time #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: Chivas has been working on their offside traps #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Jason A
timelineItems.text: Great second half aside, #RBNY are about to lose at home to a team that hasn't won on the road in more than a year. A YEAR.

timelineItems.name: John H
timelineItems.text: Have to tip your cap to Dan Kennedy- guy is playing out of his mind this half #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Russ Andolina
timelineItems.text: Attacks up the right wing, a cross that doesn't get completely through, rinse, repeat #NYvCHV

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: One last corner for #RBNY. Could’ve been a goal if someone had made a run.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Carlos Alvarez.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 1, Chivas USA 1. Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) header from very close range to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Peguy Luyindula ties it from the last corner of the game

timelineItems.name: Has Peguy Scored
timelineItems.text: Did you have any doubt?! @NewYorkRedBulls #rbny

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: With Robles in the box, Luyindula scores from the corner. #RBNY deserves this.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Brown
timelineItems.text: NYRB goal at the death. Pity. Kennedy absolutely deserved that shutout. #MLS #NYvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New York Red Bulls 1, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.text: It's cold, it's dreary...but it's great for 3 pts. This is why we don't do rainouts. #RBNY
